ygData.subject: RE: Journeyman Boots and Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The effects of Selos should still work now the way it did prior to the recent patch in that your friend should have benefitted from  Selos while you were
ygData.messageBody:
> >
> > Ok, we now know that our song will not cancel SoW anymore, but does the
> same
> > hold true for J Boots? I haven't been able to check it yet.
> >
>
> I was grouped with my friend last night; he had J Boots active; I had
> Selo's on and
> I kept overtaking him. *sigh*
>
>
The effects of Selos should still work now the way it did prior to
the recent patch in that your friend should have benefitted from Selos
while you were singing it (since you were grouped) and therefore kept up
with you (assuming it wasn't a lag issue). If he didn't, that should
probably be bugged.

Galtin of E'ci
